item.title: Episode 31
item.itunes:subtitle: Konphyg - Cascading Configuration Files
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Pedro shows you the power and simplicity of Konphyg to parse and merge configuration files for different environments.
item.description: In this episode Pedro shows you the power and simplicity of Konphyg to parse and merge configuration files for different environments.

item.title: Episode 30
item.itunes:subtitle: CouchDB and Nano
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: Pedro shows you how to interact with a CouchDB database using Nano. For documents and piping attachments.
item.description: Pedro shows you how to interact with a CouchDB database using Nano. For documents and piping attachments.

item.title: Episode 29
item.itunes:subtitle: Deploying to Nodejitsu
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Pedro shows how you can deploy your Node app to the Nodejitsu cloud.
item.description: In this episode Pedro shows how you can deploy your Node app to the Nodejitsu cloud.

item.title: Episode 28
item.itunes:subtitle: Javascript classes, prototypes and closures
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Pedro digs into Javascript prototypical chaining, pseudo-classes and closures.
item.description: In this episode Pedro digs into Javascript prototypical chaining, pseudo-classes and closures.

item.title: Episode 27
item.itunes:subtitle: Kue Jobs
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro shows you how to use to manage, produce and consume a job queue using Node.js and Kue.
item.description: On this episode Pedro shows you how to use to manage, produce and consume a job queue using Node.js and Kue.

item.title: Episode 26
item.itunes:subtitle: Starting with everyauth
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro starts using everyauth. Also using couchdb and cradle. Code here: https://github.com/pgte/nodetuts_26
item.description: On this episode Pedro starts using everyauth. Also using couchdb and cradle. Code here: https://github.com/pgte/nodetuts_26

item.title: Episode 25
item.itunes:subtitle: Nginx and Node.js
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro shows you how you can serve your Node.js app using Nginx.
item.description: On this episode Pedro shows you how you can serve your Node.js app using Nginx.

item.title: Episode 24
item.itunes:subtitle: Benchmarking your TCP server with Node.js
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro shows you how you can collect some statistics on your TCP-based server using Node.js
item.description: On this episode Pedro shows you how you can collect some statistics on your TCP-based server using Node.js

item.title: Episode 23
item.itunes:subtitle: Express resources
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro shows how you can easily modularize your express app into resources and some other niceties like auto-loading and content negotiation.
item.description: On this episode Pedro shows how you can easily modularize your express app into resources and some other niceties like auto-loading and content negotiation.

item.title: Episode 22
item.itunes:subtitle: Freezing and bundling your dependencies with node 0.4
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro explains you how you can survive dependency hell and freeze and bundle your app dependencies using node_modules and npm bundle on node v0.4.0 and greater.
item.description: On this episode Pedro explains you how you can survive dependency hell and freeze and bundle your app dependencies using node_modules and npm bundle on node v0.4.0 and greater.

item.title: Episode 21
item.itunes:subtitle: Node.js, MongoDB and Mongoose 1.1
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira explores the awsomeness of the new Mongoose API.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira explores the awsomeness of the new Mongoose API.

item.title: Episode 20
item.itunes:subtitle: Unit tests and TDD in node.js
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how you can use should.js and expresso to unit test your app.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how you can use should.js and expresso to unit test your app.

item.title: Episode 19
item.itunes:subtitle: Asynchronous Iteration Patterns
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira digs into javascript patterns for iterating over asynchronous functions.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira digs into javascript patterns for iterating over asynchronous functions.

item.title: Episode 18
item.itunes:subtitle: MongoDB and Mongoose
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira learns how to use MongoDB inside node.js using the Mongoose ODM.\r\n\r\nNote: I store clear-text passwords on this tutorial as an example. It's just to simplify. In real applications you should store a (salted) hash.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira learns how to use MongoDB inside node.js using the Mongoose ODM.\r\n\r\nNote: I store clear-text passwords on this tutorial as an example. It's just to simplify. In real applications you should store a (salted) hash.

item.title: Episode 17
item.itunes:subtitle: Building node.js modules
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira explains you how you can build node.js modules.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira explains you how you can build node.js modules.

item.title: Episode 16
item.itunes:subtitle: Introduction to Coffeescript and Node.js
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shares his explorations into Coffeescript on Node.js.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shares his explorations into Coffeescript on Node.js.

item.title: Episode 15
item.itunes:subtitle: Deploying to no.de
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows how you can deploy to Joyent no.de node.js hosting service.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows how you can deploy to Joyent no.de node.js hosting service.

item.title: Episode 14
item.itunes:subtitle: Some node.js tools
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira covers some node.js tools he uses like Nodemon, Spark2, Fugue and Node-inspector.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira covers some node.js tools he uses like Nodemon, Spark2, Fugue and Node-inspector.

item.title: Episode 13
item.itunes:subtitle: Authentication in Express - Sessions and Route middleware
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to use Express route middleware and Express sessions to handle authentication on your node.js Express app.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to use Express route middleware and Express sessions to handle authentication on your node.js Express app.

item.title: Episode 12
item.itunes:subtitle: File uploads using node.js and express
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary:
After recovering from a sore throat, Pedro Teixeira explains how you can handle file uploads using node.js and express.

Resources:

Source code:
https://gist.github.com/727178#file_app.js

Multipart:
https://github.com/isaacs/multipart-js
item.description:
After recovering from a sore throat, Pedro Teixeira explains how you can handle file uploads using node.js and express.

Resources:

Source code:
https://gist.github.com/727178#file_app.js

Multipart:
https://github.com/isaacs/multipart-js

item.title: Episode 11
item.itunes:subtitle: Express part III - RESTful forms
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira resists his sore throat and heroically shows how you can use forms in Express in a RESTful way.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira resists his sore throat and heroically shows how you can use forms in Express in a RESTful way.

item.title: Episode 10
item.itunes:subtitle: Express part II - static files, partials and locals
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to serve static files in your express apps, how to render partials and pass variables into your views.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to serve static files in your express apps, how to render partials and pass variables into your views.

item.title: Episode 9
item.itunes:subtitle: Express
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary:
On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you the Express web development framework, how to bootstrap your app, how integrate middleware into it and how to render some jade views.

Source code: https://gist.github.com/702084

References:

http://expressjs.com
http://jade-lang.com
item.description:
On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you the Express web development framework, how to bootstrap your app, how integrate middleware into it and how to render some jade views.

Source code: https://gist.github.com/702084

References:

http://expressjs.com
http://jade-lang.com

item.title: Episode 8
item.itunes:subtitle: Connect
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to equip your node.js http servers with middleware modules and how to build them using connect.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to equip your node.js http servers with middleware modules and how to build them using connect.

item.title: Episode 7
item.itunes:subtitle: Embracing all with Socket.io
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to implement a simple web-based chat server using Socke.io to achieve maximum browser interoperability.\r\n\r\nSource code: https://gist.github.com/671318
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to implement a simple web-based chat server using Socke.io to achieve maximum browser interoperability.\r\n\r\nSource code: https://gist.github.com/671318

item.title: Episode 6
item.itunes:subtitle: Simple chat with Node.js and websockets
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows how to serve websockets in node.js by making a simple web-based chat server.\r\n\r\nCode: https://gist.github.com/5151ec2f5d79ce74a68a
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows how to serve websockets in node.js by making a simple web-based chat server.\r\n\r\nCode: https://gist.github.com/5151ec2f5d79ce74a68a

item.title: Episode 5
item.itunes:subtitle: A basic TCP chat server
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to build a simple chat server using a net.Server and how to use Carrier to parse lines.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how to build a simple chat server using a net.Server and how to use Carrier to parse lines.

item.title: Episode 4
item.itunes:subtitle: Step by Step
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows an example of a deep nested application and shows the use of the Step library for helping control asynchronous flow.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows an example of a deep nested application and shows the use of the Step library for helping control asynchronous flow.

item.title: Episode 3
item.itunes:subtitle: Flush the cat - filesystem, reading files, streams, slow clients and sys.pump
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how node.js can serve static files using the fs module, introduces you to node streams, addresses the slow clients problem and shows the sys.pump utility.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows you how node.js can serve static files using the fs module, introduces you to node streams, addresses the slow clients problem and shows the sys.pump utility.

item.title: Episode 2
item.itunes:subtitle: Webtail - Node.js child processes and HTTP chunked encoding
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows the child process node.js API and shows you how to stream a child process output into your web app.
item.description: On this episode Pedro Teixeira shows the child process node.js API and shows you how to stream a child process output into your web app.

item.title: Episode 1
item.itunes:subtitle: Node.js installation and first Hello World HTTP Server
item.itunes:author: Pedro Teixeira
item.itunes:summary: On the first episode of Node Tuts, Pedro Teixeira explains how to install Node.js and also how to bootstrap your first HTTP web server.
item.description: On the first episode of Node Tuts, Pedro Teixeira explains how to install Node.js and also how to bootstrap your first HTTP web server.
